name: The Boring Game - Go Through The Tunnel
name_original: The Boring Game - Go Through The Tunnel
description:
A mysterious tunnel has been built under the city by an unknown billionaire. You accidentally found the secret and your task is to find the secrets of the tunnel and see how far it goes. Soon you will find out, the tunnel is full of pitfalls.

Features:
- addictive game-play
- infinite runner
- beat your score
- funky music
- levels are always different
- graphics - beauty in simplicity
- great action, arcade game
